name: Mk 1 Grenades
text: Uses (3 supplies). If Mk 1 Grenades has no supplies, discard it. [action] Spend 1 supply: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this attack. If this attack is successful, instead of its standard damage, this attack deals 2 damage to each enemy and each other investigator at the attacked enemy's location (any additional damage is dealt to the attacked enemy).
real_text: Uses (3 supplies). If Mk 1 Grenades has no supplies, discard it. [action] Spend 1 supply: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this attack. If this attack is successful, instead of its standard damage, this attack deals 2 damage to each enemy and each other investigator at the attacked enemy's location (any additional damage is dealt to the attacked enemy).

name: Agency Backup
text:
Agency Backup may be assigned damage and/or horror dealt to other investigators at your location.
[free] Exhaust Agency Backup and deal 1 damage to it: Deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location.
[free] Exhaust Agency Backup and deal 1 horror to it: Discover 1 clue at your location.
real_text:
Agency Backup may be assigned damage and/or horror dealt to other investigators at your location.
[free] Exhaust Agency Backup and deal 1 damage to it: Deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location.
[free] Exhaust Agency Backup and deal 1 horror to it: Discover 1 clue at your location.

name: Ghastly Revelation
text: Discover 3 clues at your location. Give any number of your clues to another investigator, or place any number of your clues on any location. You are defeated and suffer 1 mental trauma. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
real_text: Discover 3 clues at your location. Give any number of your clues to another investigator, or place any number of your clues on any location. You are defeated and suffer 1 mental trauma. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

name: Studious
text:
Permanent.
You begin each game with 1 additional card in your opening hand.
real_text:
Permanent.
You begin each game with 1 additional card in your opening hand.
flavor:
Possibly Gilman ought not to have studied so hard.
- H. P. Lovecraft, <u>The Dreams in the Witch House</u>

name: Small Favor
text:
Deal 1 damage to a non-[[Elite]] enemy at your location.
[reaction] When you play Small Favor, increase its cost by 2: Change "Deal 1 damage" to "Deal 2 damage."
[reaction] When you play Small Favor, increase its cost by 2: Change "at your location" to "at a location up to 2 connections away."
real_text:
Deal 1 damage to a non-[[Elite]] enemy at your location.
[reaction] When you play Small Favor, increase its cost by 2: Change "Deal 1 damage" to "Deal 2 damage."
[reaction] When you play Small Favor, increase its cost by 2: Change "at your location" to "at a location up to 2 connections away."

name: Another Day, Another Dollar
text:
Permanent.
You begin each game with 2 additional resources.
real_text:
Permanent.
You begin each game with 2 additional resources.
flavor: Never lose sight of what’s really important.

name: Dayana Esperence
text: Uses (3 secrets). [free]: Attach a non-weakness [[Spell]] event from your hand to Dayana Esperence. Limit 1 event attached to her. The attached event may be played as if it were in your hand. It is not placed in your discard pile after it is played (it remains attached). As an additional cost to play the attached event, exhaust Dayana Esperence and spend 1 secret.
real_text: Uses (3 secrets). [free]: Attach a non-weakness [[Spell]] event from your hand to Dayana Esperence. Limit 1 event attached to her. The attached event may be played as if it were in your hand. It is not placed in your discard pile after it is played (it remains attached). As an additional cost to play the attached event, exhaust Dayana Esperence and spend 1 secret.

name: Deny Existence
text:
Fast. Play when an encounter card or enemy attack would cause you to do one of the following (choose one): Discard cards from hand, lose resources, lose actions, take damage, or take horror.
You ignore that aspect of the effect. Then, perform the opposite of that aspect (draw cards, gain resources, gain additional actions, heal damage, or heal horror, respectively).
real_text:
Fast. Play when an encounter card or enemy attack would cause you to do one of the following (choose one): Discard cards from hand, lose resources, lose actions, take damage, or take horror.
You ignore that aspect of the effect. Then, perform the opposite of that aspect (draw cards, gain resources, gain additional actions, heal damage, or heal horror, respectively).

name: Trial by Fire
text:
Fast. Play only during your turn.
Choose one of your skills. Until the end of your turn, set the base value of that skill to 5.
real_text:
Fast. Play only during your turn.
Choose one of your skills. Until the end of your turn, set the base value of that skill to 5.
flavor: You never really know what you are capable of until something is trying to eat you.

name: Bait and Switch
text: Either (choose one): - Evade. If you succeed and the enemy is non-[[Elite]], evade the enemy and move it to a connecting location. - Evade. Use only on a non-[[Elite]] enemy at a connecting location. If you succeed, evade that enemy and switch locations with it.
real_text: Either (choose one): - Evade. If you succeed and the enemy is non-[[Elite]], evade the enemy and move it to a connecting location. - Evade. Use only on a non-[[Elite]] enemy at a connecting location. If you succeed, evade that enemy and switch locations with it.

name: Anna Kaslow
text:
You have 2 additional tarot slots.
[reaction] When the game begins, if Anna Kaslow is in your opening hand: Put her into play.
[reaction] After Anna Kaslow enters play: Search your deck for a [[Tarot]] asset and put it into play.
real_text:
You have 2 additional tarot slots.
[reaction] When the game begins, if Anna Kaslow is in your opening hand: Put her into play.
[reaction] After Anna Kaslow enters play: Search your deck for a [[Tarot]] asset and put it into play.

name: In the Clutches of Chaos
text:
Easy / Standard
[skull]: -X. X is the total amount of doom and breaches on your location.
[cultist]: Reveal another token. If there are fewer than 3 breaches on your location, place 1 breach on your location.
[tablet]: -2. For each point you fail by, remove 1 breach from the current act.
[elder_thing]: -3. If you fail, place 1 breach on a random location.
real_text:
Easy / Standard
[skull]: -X. X is the total amount of doom and breaches on your location.
[cultist]: Reveal another token. If there are fewer than 3 breaches on your location, place 1 breach on your location.
[tablet]: -2. For each point you fail by, remove 1 breach from the current act.
[elder_thing]: -3. If you fail, place 1 breach on a random location.
back_text:
Hard / Expert
[skull]: -X. X is 1 higher than the total amount of doom and breaches on your location.
[cultist]: Reveal another token. If there are fewer than 3 breaches on your location, place 1 breach on your location.
[tablet]: -3. For each point you fail by, remove 1 breach from the current act.
[elder_thing]: -4. If you fail, place 1 breach on a random location.

name: THE CHARIOT · VII
text: Forced - When doom would be placed on this agenda: Instead, place 1 breach on a number of different random locations equal to 1 more than the number of investigators. Forced - When a breach would be placed on a location with 3 breaches: Instead, resolve an incursion at that location.
real_text: Forced - When doom would be placed on this agenda: Instead, place 1 breach on a number of different random locations equal to 1 more than the number of investigators. Forced - When a breach would be placed on a location with 3 breaches: Instead, resolve an incursion at that location.
flavor:
THE CONQUEST HAS BEGUN.
ALL SHALL TREMBLE BEFORE THE HOST OF CHAOS.
SUBMIT OR PERISH.
back_text: Check Campaign Log. - If Anette Mason is possessed by evil, (→R3). - If Carl Sanford possesses the secrets of the universe, (→R4).
back_flavor: The stars vanish in the night sky as the maw of the void swallows the horizon. The muffled beating of maddening drums and the thin whine of otherworldly flutes drift through the emptiness.

name: Dark Knowledge (v. I)
text: [free] Remove 3 breaches from this act: Place 1 clue on a random location. Objective - When the investigators have collected the requisite number of clues, they must immediately spend them and advance. When this act advances, move all of the breaches on it to the next act.
real_text: [free] Remove 3 breaches from this act: Place 1 clue on a random location. Objective - When the investigators have collected the requisite number of clues, they must immediately spend them and advance. When this act advances, move all of the breaches on it to the next act.
flavor: The state of the city continues to decay. Breaches in reality begin to rip through the fabric of the Earth, and a faint melody of discordant pipes can be heard throughout the streets.

linked_card.name: Anette Mason
linked_card.text:
Spawn - Hangman's Hill.

Alert. Hunter.

Anette Mason gets -2 health for each clue controlled by an investigator.

Forced - After 1 or more breaches are placed on Anette Mason's location: Each investigator must either take 1 damage or 1 horror.
linked_card.real_text: Spawn - Hangman's Hill. Alert. Hunter. Anette Mason gets -2 health for each clue controlled by an investigator. Forced - After 1 or more breaches are placed on Anette Mason's location: Each investigator must either take 1 damage or 1 horror.

name: Beyond the Grave
text: [free] Remove 3 breaches from this act: Place 1 clue on a random location. Objective - If Anette Mason is defeated, advance.
real_text: [free] Remove 3 breaches from this act: Place 1 clue on a random location. Objective - If Anette Mason is defeated, advance.
flavor: This nightmare will not end until you stop the one behind it: Anette Mason and the spirit which possesses her. The world is falling apart all around you, and the coven is only bringing the end closer.
back_flavor:
Somehow, despite all odds, you have managed to defeat the resurrected spirit which torments Anette Mason. She passes out and collapses to the ground, but the revenant inside forces her eyes open and puppeteers her body in a lurid display. "Fools!" the ragged, disembodied voice of Keziah declares through Anette's lips as she rises once more. "You are naught but insects. I have seen the truth. I have seen the face of Chaos itself, and you will soon be a part of it. Now, come; join me, kneel before the Black Throne, and be one with the universe!"
You shudder as the words reach your ears. Nothing she says makes sense to you, but you can tell her intent is dark and wicked. "Leave this place," you muster up the will to command, "Go back to the beyond from which you were summoned, and never return."

name: Dark Knowledge (v. II)
text: [free] Remove 3 breaches from this act: Place 1 clue on a random location. Objective - When the investigators have collected the requisite number of clues, they must immediately spend them and advance. When this act advances, move all of the breaches on it to the next act.
real_text: [free] Remove 3 breaches from this act: Place 1 clue on a random location. Objective - When the investigators have collected the requisite number of clues, they must immediately spend them and advance. When this act advances, move all of the breaches on it to the next act.
flavor: The state of the city continues to decay. Breaches in reality begin to rip through the fabric of the Earth, and a faint melody of discordant pipes can be heard throughout the streets.

linked_card.name: Carl Sanford
linked_card.text:
Spawn - Silver Twilight Lodge.

Hunter. Retaliate.

Carl Sanford gets -2 health for each clue controlled by an investigator.

Forced - After any number of breaches are removed from the current act: Place 1 of them on Carl Sanford's location.
linked_card.real_text: Spawn - Silver Twilight Lodge. Hunter. Retaliate. Carl Sanford gets -2 health for each clue controlled by an investigator. Forced - After any number of breaches are removed from the current act: Place 1 of them on Carl Sanford's location.

name: New World Order
text: [free] Remove 3 breaches from this act: Place 1 clue on a random location. Objective - If Carl Sanford is defeated, advance.
real_text: [free] Remove 3 breaches from this act: Place 1 clue on a random location. Objective - If Carl Sanford is defeated, advance.
flavor: This nightmare will not end until you overthrow the one behind it: Carl Sanford and the Order of the Silver Twilight. Even with the world falling apart all around you, the cult seems intent on continuing their plot to the bitter end.
back_flavor: Using force and ingenuity, you have managed to defeat Carl Sanford at his own game. The power he was drawing from surges painfully through him. "You imbeciles," he spits, "what do you think you have accomplished? We could have been immortal. Don't you understand? We could have been gods!" he struggles to remain on his feet, his strength waning as he loses control of his power. "At what cost?" You reply, taking in the sight before you. "You would have made us slaves, not gods. Slaves to your greed and the Order's power. I'd rather stay mortal than be your thrall." "Then we will all perish," Carl responds bitterly. "I could have made us into celestials. Instead we will be extinct. I hope you are satisfied."

name: French Hill
text: [action] Choose and discard a card from your hand: Move 1 breach from French Hill to the current act, +1 additional breach for each [willpower] icon on that card.
real_text: [action] Choose and discard a card from your hand: Move 1 breach from French Hill to the current act, +1 additional breach for each [willpower] icon on that card.
back_flavor: One of the richest and most historical neighborhoods in Arkham, the many decaying mansions and estates of French Hill hold a lot of old wealth... and many more secrets.

name: French Hill
text: [action]: Test [willpower] (2). For each point you succeed by, move 1 breach from French Hill to the current act.
real_text: [action]: Test [willpower] (2). For each point you succeed by, move 1 breach from French Hill to the current act.
back_flavor: One of the richest and most historical neighborhoods in Arkham, the many decaying mansions and estates of French Hill hold a lot of old wealth... and many more secrets.

name: Rivertown
text: [action] Choose and discard a card from your hand: Move 1 breach from Rivertown to the current act, +1 additional breach for each [intellect] icon on that card.
real_text: [action] Choose and discard a card from your hand: Move 1 breach from Rivertown to the current act, +1 additional breach for each [intellect] icon on that card.
back_flavor: These past few weeks, the warehouses and docks of Rivertown have been swathed in grey mist, making an already quiet district even more empty and desolate.

name: Rivertown
text: [action]: Test [intellect] (2). For each point you succeed by, move 1 breach from Rivertown to the current act.
real_text: [action]: Test [intellect] (2). For each point you succeed by, move 1 breach from Rivertown to the current act.
back_flavor: These past few weeks, the warehouses and docks of Rivertown have been swathed in grey mist, making an already quiet district even more empty and desolate.

name: Southside
text: [free]: Discard the top 3 cards of the encounter deck and move 1 breach from Southside to the current act. Choose a [[Power]] treachery discarded by this effect and resolve its revelation ability, if able.
real_text: [free]: Discard the top 3 cards of the encounter deck and move 1 breach from Southside to the current act. Choose a [[Power]] treachery discarded by this effect and resolve its revelation ability, if able.
back_flavor: If you didn’t know any better, you would think Southside was a ghost town. All of the residents have retreated into their homes and locked their doors. The only light you see seems to be coming from the Catholic church to the south.

name: Southside
text: [free] Choose and discard any number of cards from your hand: For each card discarded in this way, move 1 breach from Southside to the current act.
real_text: [free] Choose and discard any number of cards from your hand: For each card discarded in this way, move 1 breach from Southside to the current act.
back_flavor: If you didn’t know any better, you would think Southside was a ghost town. All of the residents have retreated into their homes and locked their doors. The only light you see seems to be coming from the Catholic church to the south.

name: Uptown
text: [action] Choose and discard a card from your hand: Move 1 breach from Uptown to the current act, +1 additional breach for each [agility] icon on that card.
real_text: [action] Choose and discard a card from your hand: Move 1 breach from Uptown to the current act, +1 additional breach for each [agility] icon on that card.
back_flavor: Typically a safe neighborhood, the cobbled streets of Uptown have taken a very different mood this night. Tendrils of mist reach out from the woods that border the town, stretching over Hangman’s Brook and crawling through the streets.

name: Uptown
text: [action]: Test [agility] (2). For each point you succeed by, move 1 breach from Uptown to the current act.
real_text: [action]: Test [agility] (2). For each point you succeed by, move 1 breach from Uptown to the current act.
back_flavor: Typically a safe neighborhood, the cobbled streets of Uptown have taken a very different mood this night. Tendrils of mist reach out from the woods that border the town, stretching over Hangman’s Brook and crawling through the streets.

name: South Church
text: [action]: Draw the top card of the encounter deck. Then, move all breaches from South Church to the current act. [action]: Resign. You hide through the night.
real_text: [action]: Draw the top card of the encounter deck. Then, move all breaches from South Church to the current act. [action]: Resign. You hide through the night.
flavor: Many fearful citizens are seated at the church's wooden pews, praying and whispering amongst themselves.
back_flavor: The massive Romanesque building towers over the rest of Uptown, light shining from within its stained glass windows. Father Michael has made it a point to keep the church open at all hours, and despite the strange happenings throughout town, tonight is no different.

name: South Church
text: [action] Discard an asset you control from play: Move all breaches from South Church to the current act. [action]: Resign. You hide through the night.
real_text: [action] Discard an asset you control from play: Move all breaches from South Church to the current act. [action]: Resign. You hide through the night.
flavor: Many fearful citizens are seated at the church's wooden pews, praying and whispering amongst themselves.
back_flavor: The massive Romanesque building towers over the rest of Uptown, light shining from within its stained glass windows. Father Michael has made it a point to keep the church open at all hours, and despite the strange happenings throughout town, tonight is no different.

name: Merchant District
text: [action] Discard the top 5, 10, or 15 cards of your deck: For every 5 cards discarded in this way, move 1 breach from Merchant District to the current act. Draw each weakness discarded in this way.
real_text: [action] Discard the top 5, 10, or 15 cards of your deck: For every 5 cards discarded in this way, move 1 breach from Merchant District to the current act. Draw each weakness discarded in this way.
back_flavor: The commercial center of Arkham, the Merchant District is usually bustling at all hours. But tonight, the dockhands and sailors have vanished, leaving you with a sense of unease. The mist over the dark waters of the Miskatonic River seems to take unnatural shapes as you watch from afar.

name: Merchant District
text: [free] Spend 2 resources: Move 1 breach from Merchant District to the current act.
real_text: [free] Spend 2 resources: Move 1 breach from Merchant District to the current act.
back_flavor: The commercial center of Arkham, the Merchant District is usually bustling at all hours. But tonight, the dockhands and sailors have vanished, leaving you with a sense of unease. The mist over the dark waters of the Miskatonic River seems to take unnatural shapes as you watch from afar.

name: Hangman's Hill
text: [action]: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for a [[Witch]] enemy and draw it. Then, move all breaches from Hangman's Hill to the current act. Shuffle the encounter deck.
real_text: [action]: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for a [[Witch]] enemy and draw it. Then, move all breaches from Hangman's Hill to the current act. Shuffle the encounter deck.
back_flavor: As you approach Hangman’s Hill once more, a torrent of spirits ascend into the sky from the graveyard below. The spirits howl in torment as they surround the city, their cries becoming a music of its own.

name: Silver Twilight Lodge
text: [free] Take 1 horror: Move 1 breach from Silver Twilight Lodge to the current act.
real_text: [free] Take 1 horror: Move 1 breach from Silver Twilight Lodge to the current act.
back_flavor: As you approach the manor of the Lodge once more, you find it dark and empty. It seems that its members are still laying low, at least for the time being.

name: Hangman's Hill
text: [free] Take 1 damage: Move 1 breach from Hangman's Hill to the current act.
real_text: [free] Take 1 damage: Move 1 breach from Hangman's Hill to the current act.
back_flavor: As you approach Hangman’s Hill once more, you find it devoid of any activity - from the living or otherwise. It seems the coven has left this place behind, at least for the time being.

name: Silver Twilight Lodge
text: [action]: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for a [[Silver Twilight]] enemy and draw it. Then, move all breaches from Silver Twilight Lodge to the current act. Shuffle the encounter deck.
real_text: [action]: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for a [[Silver Twilight]] enemy and draw it. Then, move all breaches from Silver Twilight Lodge to the current act. Shuffle the encounter deck.
back_flavor: As you approach the manor of the Lodge once more, bright light shines from behind its windows. You can hear faint chanting from within.

name: Chaos Manifest
text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (3). Place 1 breach on X different random locations, where X is the amount by which you failed.
real_text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (3). Place 1 breach on X different random locations, where X is the amount by which you failed.
flavor: You look upon the face of true chaos. Everything you have ever known, everything you have ever loved - it is all meaningless by comparison.

name: Primordial Gateway
text: Revelation - Attach to a random location. Place breaches on attached location until there are exactly 3 breaches on it. Treat the attached location as if its printed text box were blank (except for [[Traits]]). [action]: Test [intellect] or [willpower] (4) to close the gateway. If you succeed, discard Primordial Gateway.
real_text: Revelation - Attach to a random location. Place breaches on attached location until there are exactly 3 breaches on it. Treat the attached location as if its printed text box were blank (except for [[Traits]]). [action]: Test [intellect] or [willpower] (4) to close the gateway. If you succeed, discard Primordial Gateway.

name: Terror Unleashed
text: Revelation - If there are no breaches on your location, place 1 breach on your location. You must take X damage or horror, divided as you wish. X is the total amount of doom and breaches on your location.
real_text: Revelation - If there are no breaches on your location, place 1 breach on your location. You must take X damage or horror, divided as you wish. X is the total amount of doom and breaches on your location.

name: Lodge Enforcer
text: Spawn - Most breaches (or Silver Twilight Lodge if there are no locations in play with breaches on them). Retaliate. Treat Lodge Enforcer's location as if its printed text box were blank (except for [[Traits]]).
real_text: Spawn - Most breaches (or Silver Twilight Lodge if there are no locations in play with breaches on them). Retaliate. Treat Lodge Enforcer's location as if its printed text box were blank (except for [[Traits]]).

name: Secrets of the Beyond
text: Revelation - Find the [[Cultist]] enemy in play with the most doom on it. For each doom on that enemy, place 1 breach on that enemy's location. If no breaches are placed by this effect, Secrets of the Beyond gains surge.
real_text: Revelation - Find the [[Cultist]] enemy in play with the most doom on it. For each doom on that enemy, place 1 breach on that enemy's location. If no breaches are placed by this effect, Secrets of the Beyond gains surge.

name: Witness of Chaos
text: Spawn - Fewest breaches. Hunter. Forced - After Witness of Chaos enters a location: Place 1 breach on that location.
real_text: Spawn - Fewest breaches. Hunter. Forced - After Witness of Chaos enters a location: Place 1 breach on that location.

name: Toil and Trouble
text: Peril. Revelation - You must either (choose one): - Resolve the revelation ability on the topmost [[Power]] treachery in the encounter discard pile. - Resolve an incursion at your location.
real_text: Peril. Revelation - You must either (choose one): - Resolve the revelation ability on the topmost [[Power]] treachery in the encounter discard pile. - Resolve an incursion at your location.
